forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
